themes: Rising operational costs for arts organizations
Financial sustainability challenges for singing groups
Need for external support to serve the community
Comparison to other a cappella choruses nationally
key_phrases: The cost of weekly rehearsal and storage space for us has doubled in the past year
It's a bigger burden than we were equipped to deal with
We've initiated fundraising efforts and are putting on more events to try to sustain our organization
there's not a lot more revenue coming in for a singing organization like ours
We really need more help or need to put in more effort to be able to become a community asset
other a cappella choruses across the country are able to do
barriers_identified: Doubling of rehearsal and storage space costs
solutions_proposed: More help (support) for organizations to become community assets
